Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.upgrade

Interface LegacyRoleManagementSessionLocal

  • @Deprecated
public interface LegacyRoleManagementSessionLocal
    Deprecated.
    The legacy Roles Management interface manages the list of roles and which access rules applies to defined roles. The roles interface also manages the list of Subjects who are part of the roles. There are three distinct methods to this interface:
    • managing the roles, which by default are only a name not associated with anything.
    • managing access rules, which makes a role into something that defines what subject can do.
    • managing subjects, which makes users part of the role thus giving them the access rights defined by the access rules of the role.
    Version:
    $Id: LegacyRoleManagementSessionLocal.java 25569 2017-03-21 23:28:38Z jeklund $
    See Also:
    specs

      • create

        AdminGroupData create​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                      String roleName)
               throws RoleExistsException
        Deprecated.
        Adds a legacy role.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - only used for audit logging
        roleName - Name of the role
        Returns:
        the AdminGroupData that was created
        Throws:
        RoleExistsException - If role by that name already exists.

      • deleteRole

        void deleteRole​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                String roleName)
        Deprecated.
        Removes a legacy role if present. Will also remove all associated access rules and user aspects.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - only used for audit logging
        roleName - The name of the role to remove.

      • addAccessRulesToRole

        AdminGroupData addAccessRulesToRole​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                    AdminGroupData role,
                                    Collection<AccessRuleData> accessRules)
        Deprecated.
        Associates a list of access rules to a role. If the given role already exists, replace it.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - only used for audit logging
        role - The role
        accessRules - A collection of access rules.
        Returns:
        the merged AdminGroupData with the new access rules

      • addSubjectsToRole

                                 AdminGroupData role,
                                 Collection<AccessUserAspectData> subjects)
        Deprecated.
        Gives the collection of subjects the given role. If the subject already exists, update it with the new value.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - only used for audit logging
        subjects - A collection of subjects
        role - The role to give.
        Returns:
        the merged AdminGroupData with the new subjects

      • createSuperAdministrator

        void createSuperAdministrator()
        Deprecated.
        Creates a super administrator role and a default CLI user. A role and default CLI user is needed in order to do operations with the CLI (command line interface).

      • addAccessRuleDataToRolesWhenAccessIsImplied

        void addAccessRuleDataToRolesWhenAccessIsImplied​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                                 String skipWhenRecursiveAccessTo,
                                                 List<String> requiredAccessRules,
                                                 List<String> grantedAccessRules,
                                                 boolean grantedAccessRecursive)
        Deprecated.
        Add the grantedAccessRules to the role when conditions are met.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - only used for audit logging
        skipWhenRecursiveAccessTo - ignore all roles that have recursive access to the rule
        requiredAccessRules - all access rules that the role must be authorized to in order to extend the grants (if a grantedAccessRules is present here it is not required)
        grantedAccessRules - the access rules to grant
        grantedAccessRecursive - true if the access rules should be granted as recursive

      • setTokenTypeWhenNull

        void setTokenTypeWhenNull​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken)
        Deprecated.
        Set the tokenType to X509CertificateAuthenticationTokenMetaData.TOKEN_TYPE if it was not set before.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - only used for audit logging

      • deleteAllRoles

        void deleteAllRoles​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken)
        Deprecated.
        Delete ALL legacy AdminGroupData, AdminEntityData and AccessRuleData.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - only used for audit logging
